channel.description: Recent content on Stefanni Brasil - The Kind Developer

item.title: Thank You
item.description: Thank you! Welcome to this newsletter. I’m happy that you decided to be strategic about learning how to make a living with Ruby on Rails in 2021. If you think your friends and followers might benefit from this newsletter, would you share this? Click here to tweet See you in your inbox! -Stefanni from stefannibrasil.me

item.title: Is Ruby on Rails Still Relevant in 2021
item.description: You have been thinking of learning Ruby on Rails in 2021. You even started tinkering with Ruby and you love how quirky, dynamic and fun it makes you feel. But then, it’s not long until you encounter questions like these: And you start questioning yourself: “What if RoR is a dying domain? Will I be better going with Python, Go?” Although you are certain you don’t want to go with the traditional web dev JS road, you are not convinced Ruby on Rails is a good path to go.

item.description: About Stefanni Brasil - The Kind Developer

item.title: How to Become Confident - Tips & Books
item.description: I believed I had to had born confident. And I wasn’t, so why keep trying? How happy I am to have been wrong about that! This post brings some tips from the book “The Confidence Code: The Science and Art of Self-Assurance - What women should know”. And some lessons from my Cognitive Behaviour Therapy sessions. Ready? üöÄ How to practice Self-Confidence When in doubt, ACT. Decide. What kills overconfidence is overthinking.
